articles.title: The numbers behind England's incredible year of Test cricket
articles.description: TMS statistician Andy Zaltzman assesses the numbers behind England's incredible year of Test cricket.
articles.content:
Harry Brook has joined an elite list of players with three or more hundreds in their first four Tests
In the curious vernacular of sports punditry, it is often said a team or individual which has pe… [+8147 chars]

articles.title: Aussie young gun's eye-watering IPL deal
articles.description: The IPL’s 2023 auction kicked off with a bang on Friday night, with cricket’s biggest spenders laying down huge sums of money for the game’s premier T20 stars.
articles.content:

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
